rows.label: tev022401_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Jo about the infrastructure of NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Jo about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Jo about her work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Jo about her work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_MSG0001
rows.name:
This commercial district was designed to have an
old-timey flavor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_MSG0002
rows.name:
But Armory Alley in the administrative district, where
BLADEs buy their weapons and such, was built to be
totally state-of-the-art. It's pretty amazing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_MSG0003
rows.name:
Just press a few buttons at a terminal and you can
buy anything. Even Skells![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_MSG0004
rows.name:
Of course, everything that I touch immediately breaks,
so I won't be buying anything like that anytime soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_MSG0005
rows.name:
Bwah! Why are sparks coming out of my ordering
terminal? And after I just said that... Aaaargh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_MSG0008
rows.name: Welcome to the Sunshine Café![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_MSG0009
rows.name:
Oh, hey there, [ST:playername ].
You probably want a latte or something, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_MSG0010
rows.name:
Yeaaaaah. See, actually, the espresso machine...
Well, I kind of broke it. Again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_MSG0011
rows.name:
But I could make you a drip coffee in this old-school
plastic coffee maker![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_MSG0012
rows.name:
Letrick at the cathedral suggested that, since it probably
wouldn't break even if I dropped it. He's been such
a big help to me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_MSG0020
rows.name:
After I broke my third ordering terminal,
Coco told me to just use a pen and paper.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_MSG0021
rows.name:
I haven't actually had to write in longhand since I was
in school. I've completely forgotten how to spell![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_MSG0022
rows.name:
What about you, [ST:playername ]?
I bet you know how scary it is to realize you've
become reliant on a digital world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_MSG0023
rows.name:
Anyway, that's one hot coffee. C-O-F-E-E...Y?
No, that's weird. Let me try again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_MSG0024
rows.name:
...Huh? Oh, come ON! There's no ink coming out!
And this is a brand-new pen![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_MSG0039
rows.name:
I broke all those ordering terminals, and the pen
and paper thing didn't work out so well either...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_MSG0040
rows.name:
So I've decided to just memorize everyone's orders!
Aaaand what can I get you today?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_MSG0041
rows.name:
...Okay, so you want today's lunch special and
pancake combo. You want pepperoncini in your pasta,
and afterward, a double espresso with three sugars.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_MSG0042
rows.name:
...You also want a grappa caffè corretto as an aperitif,
and on your way out, an iced cappuccino in a to-go
cup with pistachio ice cream and two...straws?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022401_MSG0043
rows.name: ...Oh no! My brain! I broke it![ST:wait ]
